title: Handmade in the Boroughs Bazaar at Grand Bazaar NYC
description: A bazaar featuring handmade goods from local artisans at Grand Bazaar NYC.
address: 100 W 77th St at Columbus Ave, UWS

title: 43rd Annual Dominican Day Parade
description: Celebrate Dominican culture at the annual parade along Sixth Avenue.
address: Sixth Avenue from W 39th to W 54th Streets

title: A Great Day in Harlem (Part of Harlem Week)
description: Join the celebration at General Grant National Memorial for a day of activities and community.
address: General Grant National Memorial, Morningside Heights

title: Korea Fest
description: A festival celebrating Korean culture and community on Steinway Street.
address: Steinway Street between 31st Ave + Broadway, Astoria

title: Frozen Treats Takedown
description: A competition featuring frozen treats at Threes Brewing in Gowanus.

title: Jo Firestone Presents the First Annual Pie Tasting Festival
description: Join comedian Jo Firestone for a pie tasting festival at Littlefield in Gowanus.

title: Chinatown Block Party
description: Celebrate community at the Chinatown Block Party on Mosco Street.

title: Ninth Annual Indian Independence Day Celebration
description: Join the celebration at Exchange Place Plaza in Jersey City for Indian Independence Day.

title: 28th Annual NYC Black Pride
description: Celebrate Black Pride across various locations in NYC.

title: Grand Street Summer Restaurant Week
description: Enjoy special menus and deals at restaurants in East Williamsburg.

title: Brooklyn Bites by Blundstone: Rooftop Food Festival
description: A rooftop food festival at Brooklyn Grange featuring various food vendors and activities.
address: Brooklyn Grange at Sunset Park, Brooklyn

title: Spike's Joint Pop-Up Poster + Book Stoop Sale
description: A pop-up sale featuring posters and books at filmmaker Spike Lee’s HQ, with Spike Lee in attendance for signings.
address: 40 Acres and a Mule HQ, Fort Greene

title: Black Vegfest
description: A festival celebrating plant-based living and culture at Lincoln Terrace Park.

title: Yoga Block Party
description: Join the community for a yoga block party on Graham Avenue, featuring yoga sessions and activities.
address: Graham Ave between Scholes and Meserole, East Williamsburg

title: K-Pop Foodie Fest
description: A food festival celebrating K-Pop culture and cuisine at Magnolia Landing.

title: 35th Hong Kong Dragon Boat Festival
description: Join the excitement of the Hong Kong Dragon Boat Festival at Flushing Meadows Corona Park.

title: Intrepid Summer Beer Wine and Spirits Fest
description: Enjoy a variety of beers, wines, and spirits at the Intrepid Museum in Hell's Kitchen. Save 40% on advance tickets with promo code ‘theskint’.

title: Annual East Harlem Giglio Festival
description: Join the festivities at the Annual East Harlem Giglio Festival, featuring food, music, and cultural celebrations.
address: Pleasant Avenue between 114th + 116th Streets, East Harlem

title: Free Shakespeare in the Park: Twelfth Night
description: Enjoy a free performance of Twelfth Night at Central Park's Delacorte Theater.

title: Alan Turing + The Queen of the Night
description: A queer fantasy musical about Alan Turing at The Players Theatre.

title: Chain NYC Film Festival
description: A celebration of bold voices and original storytelling featuring over 160 films at Chain Theatre.
address: Chain Theatre, Garment District / Hell's Kitchen

title: Bad Survivor with Alex Dvorak
description: Screening of the indie dark comedy 'Bad Survivor' at Quad Cinema.

title: Lincoln Center’s Fourth Annual Summer for the City
description: An arts festival featuring free and choose-what-you-pay events at Lincoln Center.

title: Get Insider Access to the City’s Best Secrets with New York Adventure Club
description: Explore NYC's hidden gems with guided tours and experiences.

title: Summerstage
description: A series of free outdoor shows featuring various artists at different locations.

title: 47th Annual BRIC Celebrate Brooklyn! Festival
description: New York City’s longest-running free outdoor performing arts festival at Prospect Park.

title: Demolition Man: Fan Parody Event
description: A staged parody fan event at Chain Theatre with trivia and audience participation.
address: Chain Theatre, Garment District / Hell's Kitchen
